flawed_nl_solution:
The team has won 40 x 70/100 = <<40*70/100=28>>28 games out of 40.
There a total of 40 + 10 = <<40+10=40>>40 games to be played.
The team has to win a total of is 40 x 60/100 = <<40*60/100=24>>24 games.
So, it still needs to win 24 - 28 = <<24-28=-4>>-4 more games.
Hence, they can still lose 10 - -4 = <<10--4=14>>14 games.
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
